summary: "Transformers: Dark of the Moon" is an action-packed sci-fi movie from 2011, part of the Transformers series. It's about giant robots, the Autobots led by Optimus Prime and Bumblebee, fighting their enemies, the Decepticons, to control powerful technology left on the Moon. This technology can save their home planet, Cybertron. The film stars Shia LaBeouf and was directed by Michael Bay. It was a big hit, making over $1 billion worldwide, but some critics didn't like the story. It was filmed in many places and used special 3D cameras to make the robot battles look amazing.
title: Transformers Dark of the Moon
